title: Monday Post Show (05-16-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (05-16-22)
description:
Bobby starts with a voicemail from a listener who found a tick in their bed and needs advice on what to do. Bobby shares that he is doing vocals for a new Raging Idiots song today…and Eddie forgot. Bobby shares a news story about a woman who had getting arrested on her bucket list and Abby shares what (kinda sad) thing is on her bucket list. We get into Eddie and Abby wanting to skydive and if it’s a good idea or not. Amy shares an interesting protocol Scotty McCreery has when taking pictures with fans. We get a peek into Eddie’s life and seeking help because he’s been feeling sad.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Bobby shares a news story about a woman who had getting arrested on her bucket list and Abby shares what (kinda sad) thing is on her bucket list. We get into Eddie and Abby wanting to skydive and if it’s a good idea or not. Amy shares an interesting protocol Scotty McCreery has when taking pictures with fans. We get a peek into Eddie’s life and seeking help because he’s been feeling sad.
